subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Shameka Christon hit a crucial 3-pointer with 23.9 seconds remaining, capping a 9-2 run that the Liberty used to finish off the Sky at Madison Square Garden on Sunday.
snippet: Shameka Christon hit a crucial 3-pointer with 23.9 seconds remaining, capping a 9-2 run that the Liberty used to finish off the Sky at Madison Square Garden on Sunday.
